plot:
The middle child Sune and his family is suppose to go to Greece on their
 holiday, but after a minor mishap at the travel agency, Sune's dad 
Rudolf decides that a trip to Greece would be too expensive, so they 
bring out their old caravan instead. Rudolf has an accident and they all
 go to the hospital where Sune falls in love on first sight with a cute 
girl. He tries to make a good first impression, but fails miserably. He 
will have another chance though when his and the girl's families wind up
 at the same camping. Fuente: IMDb
title: Sunes sommar
